plugins.description: Shows completion for NSLocalizedString

plugins.description: This fixin makes Xcode show all find options (such as "Ignore Case") in the find bar when it opens.

plugins.description: Upon pressing tab, this fixin makes Xcode accept the currently-highlighted completion suggestion in the popup list.

plugins.name: XCFixin_CustomizeWarningErrorHighlights
plugins.description: Customize the inline error/warning message highlight color. Useful if you want to be able to read your code when using a dark background color.

plugins.description: Reinstates some semblance of the Xcode 3.x User Scripts menu. See documentation in the XCFixin_UserScripts directory.

plugins.description: Open the related Github page of a source file directly form the Xcode editor code window.

plugins.description: Opens the current xcworkspace / xcproject in AppCode.

plugins.description: An Xcode Plugin to show the state of FBSnapshot Tests.

plugins.name: RedXcode
plugins.description: Visually differentiate Xcode instances being ran in a debugger.

plugins.name: XcodeExplorer
plugins.description: This is a plugin project that allows you, as a developer, to explore the various events and notifications that Xcode4 emits during normal operations.

plugins.description: An Xcode plugin that aims to make altering and inspecting code quick and easy.

plugins.name: BTGisterPost-Xcode5
plugins.description: Xcode 5+ only. This plug-in allow developers to quickly post gist's to GitHub directly from XCode.It supports Xcode 5.x.

plugins.description: Xcode plug-in which helps you write Javadoc style documents easier.

plugins.description: Enables fuzzy matching in Xcode's autocomplete, using the 'Open Quickly' algorithm.

plugins.description: XcAddedMarkup is an Xcode plugin that adds a custom markup for hyperlinks and images inside the Xcode console and the Xcode source editor

plugins.description: An amazing Xcode plugin to align regular code. It can align Xnything in any way you want.
